short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: List and search all text links, javascript, css, and image sources

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
List links from webpages in a new tab and search using regular expressions. Open the list from the page context menu.

Links are grouped into the following categories: Text links, style sheets, external scripts, images, audio sources, video sources, iframes, and miscellaneous (fav icons, rss, opensearch, etc.)
